monster.name: Octopus

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
trait.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 333, Storm King's Thunder, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
